info.title: Ice and Fire (Game of Thrones)
info.description: Ice And Fire is the world's greatest source for quantified and structured data from the universe of Ice and Fire (and the HBO series Game of Thrones). We give you access to data about all the Books, Characters and Houses in an easy to use format.

isbn.description: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN-13) that uniquely identifies this book.
isbn.title: ISBN

authors.description: An array of names of the authors that wrote this book.
authors.title: Authors

numberOfPages.description: The number of pages in this book.
numberOfPages.title: Number Of Pages

publisher.description: The company that published this book.
publisher.title: Publisher

country.description: The country that this book was published in.
country.title: Country

mediaType.description: The type of media this book was released in.
mediaType.title: Media Type

released.description: The date (ISO 8601) when this book was released.
released.title: Released

characters.description: An array of Character resource URLs that are in this book.
characters.title: Characters

povCharacters.description: An array of Character resource URLs that has had a POV-chapter in this book.
povCharacters.title: POV Characters

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Books with the given name are included in the response.

parameters.name: fromReleaseDate
parameters.description: Books that were released after, or on, the given date are included in the response.

parameters.name: toReleaseDate
parameters.description: Books that were released after, or on, the given date are included in the response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number requested.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The size of the page requested.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Houses with the given name are included in the response.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Houses that belong in the given region are included in the response.

parameters.name: words
parameters.description: Houses that has the given words are included in the response.

parameters.name: hasWords
parameters.description: Houses that have words (or not) are included in the response.

parameters.name: hasTitles
parameters.description: Houses that have titles (or not) are included in the response.

parameters.name: hasSeats
parameters.description: Houses that have titles (or not) are included in the response.

parameters.name: hasDiedOut
parameters.description: Houses that are extinct are included in the response.

parameters.name: hasAncestralWeapons
parameters.description: Houses that have ancestral weapons (or not) are included in the response.
